title: Gaia Realini Poised to ‘Play Her Cards’ In Tour de France Femmes Mountains
content:
Mountain hotshot reflects on her Tour debut after getting through 'dangerous' Dutch stages, thanks to Deignan and team-mates.

Read the full article at Gaia Realini Poised to ‘Play Her Cards’ In Tour de France Femmes Mountains on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
